data.subject: Up To The Mountain (The Voice Performance)
data.lyric:
I went up to the mountain
 Because you asked me to
 Up over the clouds
 
 To where the sky was blue

data.subject: A Change Is Gonna Come (The Voice Performance)
data.lyric:
I was born by the river in a little tent
 Oh, and just like the river I've been running ever since

data.subject: And I`m Telling You I`m Not Going (The Voice Performance)
data.lyric:
And I'm telling you I'm not going
 You're the best man I ever know
 There's no way I can ever go
